      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component Manager.detach()
      Detached the component managed by this manager (and its children, if any) from the component tree that it currently belongs to.

      Return the component's parent.

      Methods in org.jdrupes with parameters of type Component 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Manager Manager.addChild(Component child)
      Adds the given component node as a child.
      static Manager Utils.manager(Component component)
      Return a component's manager.
      void Manager.removeChild(Component child)
      Remove the given component from the set of children.
      static void Utils.start(Component application)
      Fires a Start event with an associated Started completion event on the broadcast channel of the given application.
